alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of , the southern City of Norfolk, the eastern City of Chesapeake, the City of Portsmouth and the City of Virginia Beach through 645 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Back Bay, or near Virginia Beach, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Virginia Beach, Virginia Wesleyan University, Downtown Norfolk, Regent University, Great Bridge, Kempsville, Downtown Portsmouth, Norfolk State University, Norfolk, Chesapeake, Portsmouth, Back Bay, Fentress, Norfolk International, Ghent, Norview, Northwest, Cradock, Princess Anne and South Norfolk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
